image_spec.note: Placeholder images are referenced per item by filename. Use a category-specific template and save as the item filename.

items.title: Print Aurora #01
items.description: Fine art print on archival paper exploring gradients of dawn light. Subtle texture and balanced contrast make it suitable for modern interiors.

items.title: Print Aurora #02
items.description: Fine art print capturing transitional light between night and day. Crisp tonal separation with refined edge detail.

items.title: Print Aurora #03
items.description: Limited print series highlighting subtle noise and film-like grain. Ideal for gallery framing.
